channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Cory K. Costello
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on Cory K. Costello

item.title: Consensus, Accuracy, and Consequences of Hearsay Reputations
item.description: Costello, C. K. & Srivastava, S. (2018). Consensus, Accuracy, and Consequences of Hearsay Reputations. In R. Rau (Chair), Making good impressions: On the antecedents and consequences of peer reputations. Symposium conducted at the 19th European Conference on Personality (Zadar, Croatia).
